languages.text: Enemies affected by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. On failure they suffer 5 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and gain the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect.
languages.original_text: Враги, затронутые этой {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностью{/g}, должны пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g}. При провале, они получают 5 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} и на них накладывается {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g}.

On failure they suffer 5 damage and gain the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}effect{/g}.

languages.original_text: Enemies affected by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. On failure they suffer 5 damage and gain the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}.

languages.text: 受此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}影响的敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。未能通过检定的目标会受到5点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，并获得{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}效果。
languages.original_text: Enemies affected by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. On failure they suffer 5 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and gain the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text: 受此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}影响的敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。未能通过检定的目标会受到5点伤害，并获得{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}效果{/g}。

受此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}影响的敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。未能通过检定的目标会受到5点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，并获得{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}。

languages.text: この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の効果の下にある敵は、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に合格しなければならない。失格すると5{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受け、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}効果を得る。
languages.original_text: Enemies affected by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. On failure they suffer 5 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and gain the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text: この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の効果の下にある敵は、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗テスト{/g}に合格しなければならない。失格すると5ダメージを受け、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}効果{/g}を得る。

この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の効果の下にある敵は、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に合格しなければならない。失格すると5{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受け、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を得る。

languages.text: Los enemigos afectados por esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} tienen que superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}. Si fallan, sufren 5 de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y el efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} .
languages.original_text: Enemies affected by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. On failure they suffer 5 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and gain the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text: Los enemigos afectados por esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} tienen que superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}. Si fallan, sufren 5 de daño y el {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}efecto{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} .

languages.text: Von dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} beeinflusste Feinde müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} bestehen. Misslingt die Probe, erleiden sie 5 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} und werden mit {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} belegt.
languages.original_text: Enemies affected by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. On failure they suffer 5 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and gain the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text: Von dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} beeinflusste Feinde müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeits{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestehen. Bei Nichtbestehen erleiden sie 5 Schaden und erhalten den {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutungs{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}Effekt{/g}.

languages.text: Les ennemis affectés par cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}. S'ils échouent à ce test, ils subissent 5 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} et sont frappés par l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}.
languages.original_text: Enemies affected by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. On failure they suffer 5 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and gain the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text: Les ennemis affectés par cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance {/g}. S'ils échouent à ce test, ils subissent 5 points de dégâts et sont frappés par l'{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}.

languages.text: Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetten{/g} etkilenen düşmanlar, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmek zorundadır. Başarısız olanlar, 5 puan {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} alır ve {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g} etkisine maruz kalır.
languages.original_text: Enemies affected by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. On failure they suffer 5 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and gain the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect.
